Reviews.Title: “Stayed as part of a tour group”
Reviews.Author: havachatkiwi
Reviews.Content: I cant fault the reception staff or large twin room. Nice marble bathroom = shower head has a lot of water coming out of the middle nozzle but ample hot water. Breakfast a good spread. Only downfall is the laptop for free internet usage. Bad keybaord and has a virus which is a shame for a hotel that gives itself 4 stars I think?

Reviews.Title: “Kind and hospitable staff”
Reviews.Author: Muemmer M
Reviews.Content: Along with the excellent free breakfast buffet and great rooms, the staff was very kind and hospitable throughout our stay at the Gulhane Park Hotel. The hotel was in very short walking distance from the Topkapi Palace, Blue Mosque, Gulhane Park, and many others. Everyday after leaving the hotel we came back to see an excellently clean room. I would like to personally thank the staff of the hotel, including the manager Mr.Sonor, the daytime desk receptionist Veysel Aydinc, Bayram Karabulut, and Atilla Kenar. Rather than treating us like just customers we were treated like family. Every morning at breakfast the female attendant Cembe treated my baby daughter like her own daughter. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for a marvellous holiday in Istanbul!”
Reviews.Author: Shad M
Reviews.Content: I've had a fantastic trip to Istanbul and had verry nice days in Gulhane Park Hotel, thanks to their excellent service, especially mr Veysel, who made my visit to Istanbul memorable. I recommend you to choose this hotel in Istanbul! Shad

Reviews.Title: “Great location and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Chris71Ottawa
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the heart of the old town and is minutes away (on foot) from all the major attractions - hagia Sophia, blue mosque, grand bazaar, etc... We also walked to the water front, sulemanyie mosque (a bit far but well worth a visit). W used the car service provided by the hotel and while pricey by Istanbul standards (35 euro each way) it provided great piece of mind. The room is ok, fairly similar to other European hotels in Rome, Paris etc for the same price. Th breakfast buffet is ok again on par with other European hotels. The only issue we had was that the room was not swept for the first three days of our stay. A minor complaint really. Overall the staff were exceptional and the service was outstanding. We were skeptical of the tour that veysel told us about - the 70 euro all day boat and dolmbahce palace tour but in the end we were so glad we took it, the palace was amazing (more beautiful than Versailles by far). We took the tram 2 TL and it was easy to use and hassle free. Overall we had a great time in Istanbul and it was niceto have a home base so conveniently located.

Reviews.Title: “Met expectations”
Reviews.Author: arnbk
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a total of three nights. You cannot ask for anything better when it comes to location, it is about a 10 minute walk to Topkapi palace, Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia, and walkable distance from grand bazaar and Egyptian spice bazaar. Only problem for us was getting and out to this place from the Ataturk airport was tedious. The roads are pretty narrow to get to the hotel so one can get stuck in traffic jam for some time. The place is also a good 2 hr or more from Sabiha GÃ¶kÃ§en airport. We stayed in two separate room during our stay, the first room that we got was cramped but comfortable enough. There was not much of a view and also you can expect noise because of traffic. We got a different room when we were leaving Istanbul, and that room was much more spacious. Breakfast served was good, and the view from the breakfast room is excellent. The breakfast is served at the top most floor in the hotel. Even though we did not use the public transport, there is a tram service running closeby. There is an internet station available at the lobby that was available most of the time. In all, we would like to stay there again if we return to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in a good location.”
Reviews.Author: david i
Reviews.Content: Our taxi from Ataturk airport turned down a narrow yet welcoming street still wet from recent rain, and pulled up outside the Gulhane Park Hotel. Although due to a flight delay we arrived well after midnight, the hotel staff on duty - Veysel and Muhittin - immediately made us feel very welcome. Excellent service is a hallmark of this hotel and the staff spare no effort to make their guests comfortable. Located within a 5 minute walk from the some of the main attractions of Byzantium and the Ottoman Empire, the Gulhane Park Hotel is an ideal base for exploring the history, culture and architecture of modern Istanbul. The hotel probably does not merit four star status, though.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Whabooks
Reviews.Content: Clean comfortable and quiet. Lovely breakfast. Staff pleasant. No complaints whatsoever. Location is perfect for sightseeing.

Reviews.Title: “A nice place to stay in the old town of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Stella L
Reviews.Content: We were invited to participate to a cultural event at Istanbul and decided to stay in the area of the old town for 3 days. Our choise from internet was excellent. Gulhane park hotel is close to Agia Sophia, Topkapi, Blue Mosque, also close to tram station and Bosporus. Near the hotel there are 2 mini markets, lokantaries (local fast food), shops with presents, herbs etc. in good prices, sometimes better than those of Kapali charsi. The rooms are very clean, not big, not small. The personnel of the hotel was very kind and friendly and did his best to satisfy and help us. Many thanks to Veysel, also to Bayram, Muhittin, Irfan for their assistance and their help. If it happens to go again to Istanbul for another cultural event or vacations, we would like to stay again there.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent customer service, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Bojan-Montenegro
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best customer service I ever had. Bayram and Veysel was the best especially Bayram. Hotel is close to Topkapi, Haghia Sophia and Blue Mosque. Also, Gulhane tram station is 100 meters from the hotel which is a good connection in every direction you decided to go. Minus for hotel is extra charge for omlette and fresh orange juice, also for the brealfast there is no fried egg as well except boiled. In general- I will recommend this place to everyone and will come back here with my wife again.

Reviews.Title: “Magnificient service and a very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: The hotel is situated very well, and is quite although close to many attractive places and close to both the tram, the train station and rather close to the boats. The personnel is quite hospital and give good advice on happenings in Istanbul, including how to go these places. After staying there a week i recommend this hotel to anybody.

Reviews.Title: “Complete disappointment and a rip off”
Reviews.Author: ken685
Reviews.Content: The first room we were in smelt like raw sewage. we went to reception and were promised it would be changed the next day but it wasn't. We asked for the cleaner to come up but that didn't happen. we complained again to a more helpful receptionist called veysel. he is the only reason i can give this hotel a 2 anywhere on this review as he on his own deserves a 5. it turned out the smell was due to the drains were not cleaned. and to top it all off when we arrived the sheets were dirty. this is advertised as a 4 star hotel but in reality it doesn't deserve 2 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Raul A
Reviews.Content: An excellent hotel, good place to stay, breakfast very good, and the proximity of the main historical monuments make it very special, most of its staff very helpful, but if there is an isolated case go to the manager Soner Onal that is going to solve any problem ... Istanbul is a city impossible to forget.Undo edits

Reviews.Title: “Gulhane Park Hotel, Istanbul, Turkey”
Reviews.Author: jen s
Reviews.Content: I just visited Istanbul March 2012, and stayed at the Gulhane Park Hotel, the location is great, it's really close to everything you would like to see in Istanbul, at a walking distance. The food in the hotel restaurant is really good too and the staff was really friendly and helpfull, they make you feel that you are right at home. Highly recommend this hotel if you are planning to visit Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Nice beautyfull hotel with helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: alexander_ko
Reviews.Content: Im staying in this Hotel everytime i come to Istanbul for business. Its nice, central, close to all interesting places of istanbul, not far away from tram, ferry boat and bus and taxi stations. all you can reach in minutes by foot and you do not need a own car. if you are tired about the city, take a walk in the gÃ¼lhane park and get relaxed. i also bring my family comes here time to time with me and in summer we have a wonderful breakfast on the roof terrace, with a wonderful view over istanbul. come enjoy and leave with a smile.

Reviews.Title: “Superb hotel”
Reviews.Author: TeoCiCo
Reviews.Content: Great accommodation expirience ,special thanks goes to Veysel best receptionist ever ,looking foward to be guest of the hotel during the september 2012 .

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: SEarmo
Reviews.Content: Beware of inflated prices. We visited Easter 2011, booked a "deluxe" family room for 4 nights. We left after 1. Overpriced room E425. The room was average/small for a double, it was ridiculous with 4 small and uncomfortable beds all pushed together. We were misled by the website. The hotel is not in the gardens not even visible, just some back street. Maybe the good reviews come from visitors who paid knocked down prices, otherwise they just don't make sense.

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Simon M
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my family at The Gulhane Park hotel and it was a great location. Easy walking to the trams with access to many sights of Istanbul. The hotel staff were very helpful and accommodating and my 3 year old loved his small bed! Veysel in particular on the front desk was extremely helpful and made it very easy for us to book for the Dervish show at the train station.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel and personel”
Reviews.Author: MRKarakurt
Reviews.Content: Last week I spend 5 days in this hotel with my son, Hotel was very clean and nice except for the television in the room, it's too small . But most of all the personel (reception,bell boy, sauna and waiters) were extremely nice and helpfull. Next visit will be definetely in same hotel.

Reviews.Title: “a fantastic lodging!!”
Reviews.Author: Yusuf T
Reviews.Content: we have had a fantastic visit in Istanbul and staying at GULHANE PARK HOTEL was a comfortable experience mostly because of the service which was crowned by two gentlemen, Veysel and Irfan. center situated, clean, and a generous and heavenly breakfast. Thank you for your kindness the Tabbakh Family

Reviews.Title: “A decent hotel that suited us well.”
Reviews.Author: tptr
Reviews.Content: I would rate the Gulhane Park as a 3-star plus hotel. Although we booked through Orbitz, the room assigned us had to have been one of their better rooms. Our room was kept very clean during our weeklong stay. Leaky shower stall (must be under the shower base) meant a wet bathroom floor, and it was of no use asking for extra towels to sop up the water. Our bathroom had a bad odor (not through our doing!) which I think has to do with a lack of traps on their grey water fixtures (such as shower) and the fact that the bath floor drain seems to be tied directly to the plumbing vent stack. But what do I know as I'm not a plumber by trade! Unlike some other TA reviews, we had a desk chair in our room. If you do not, I'm sure you could ask for one. Free promised "welcome drink" never materialized. Great location with easy access to the recommended sites as well as the tram line. If you are using the tram, I'd suggest walking up hill toward Topkapi and using the Gulhane tram stop. Excellent and friendly staff. They'll try to sell you on package tours, but just say you are doing them on your own. The short Bosphorus boat tours in particular are about a third the price of the hotel offering. Good restaurants in the area including Imbat and Faros. Breakfast doesn't seem to vary from day to day, but is more than adequate with good variety. The computer available for use is terribly slow, and I gave up on using it after one attempt. Room flat screen tv was adequate, although sound quality was not very good. As others have mentioned, walls are rather thin. We would stay there again on a return trip.

Reviews.Title: “Not so clean, but ok”
Reviews.Author: aida_b1
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for more than 5 days and this hotel has a very Good Location. BUT the cleanliness was terrible specially in the bathroom. The staff was always Kind. Btw. Dont Book the tours from the hotel, Book them into the Internet or Tourist offices (much cheaper). But it was oberall acceptable for a few days.

Reviews.Title: “The right hotel at the right place !”
Reviews.Author: Pierre C
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel : Quiet, clean, and very close from Blue Mosque, Serebatan cistern, Hagia Sofia and the baazar ! People there are helpful, bringing any assistance for blanket, chair, and good informations for the tourist. Many thanks to Irfan, Bayram and Seysel. I hope they will keep the prices low for a long time and then I will go back there ! Pierre from Switzerland

Reviews.Title: “Great location but the standard of the hotel was very poor.”
Reviews.Author: Debzcarolan
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel for a mini break and have just returned. Our room was booked as a superior double but we got a very basic, tiny room-when we complained to the receptionist that we didn't get what the website described he stated we should have sent an email with specific request and if we werent happy to take it up with the manager. We did this the following morning and I showed him what we booked on website as opposed to what we got- he advised the pictures we saw related to triple rooms- I stated he had incorrectly advertised the rooms. My partner was very unhappy but as our stay was short we stuck it out. There was an overwhelming smell of sewage in the hotel each nite and after complaining our room was not made up again we would never go back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: luckytraveller777
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for everything, you guys made our holiday memorable. All of the staff was really nice and friendly. Our favourite person was Veysel, he was nice and kind and he was helpful, we want to thank everyone and hopefully see you all soon. best regards;

Reviews.Title: “Great, affordable hotel”
Reviews.Author: EuroFans
Reviews.Content: The hotel may seem small on the outside, but it is nice inside. The room was big enough for a queen bed and two single beds. It had a great heater to keep us warm at night, and the beds were very comfortable for our family of four. My only minor complaint is that the water pressure in the shower was a little low, but I was still able to shower. Wifi worked well in the room. Here is a tip to anyone going to Istanbul: don't drink the water, even in the hotel. We bought large bottles of water at the shop around the corner from the hotel for about 75 cents each and it was perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Bengt”
Reviews.Author: Bengt J
Reviews.Content: This is a good hotel. It is situated close to many interested places. The rooms were of good standard and the breakfast was also appreciated by us.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded my Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Fahima291
Reviews.Content: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Gulhane Park Hotel as it is situated in the heart of Istanbul close to many of the tourist attractions such as Topkapi Palace, Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque thus everything was in walking distance. The hotel also provides extra facilities such as a gym, sauna and spa for the added luxury. The hotel rooms were also very tidy, clean and fairly spacious. The restaurant downstairs was also very good and the breakfast was ok although there is still room for improvement. There are also various other places to sit and chat such as the lobby, cafe and the roof top terrace with a beautiful view of the city. There's also a tram link which is very close to the hotel. A big thank you to the hotel staff Mr Bayram, Mr Veysal and Mr Arif for being very friendly, informative and providing an excellent service. And thanks to Mr Mohiedeen for making us his 'special fruit cocktail' and for greeting us warmly every morning. All in all a very good hotel and I would definitely recommend to others for making your visit to Istanbul all the more worthwhile for its excellent service, friendly staff, price and stunning location.

Reviews.Title: “Great stuff!”
Reviews.Author: Hafizur
Reviews.Content: I thought this hotel had great service and I was very impressed with the members of stuff- they were very friendly and welcoming, especially Mr. Bayram, Mr. Veysel and Mr. Arif. They were very helpful and keen to answer and respond to any queries I had. I was very impressed with the level of interaction they had with their guests.This hotel is also in a very convenient location because it is only a few minutes away from iconic and interesting places to visit. The rooms were also very clean. However, I do think that there should be a level of improvement in the breakfast they serve- I dont think there was enough of a variety for selection. But other than that, what made this hotel a perfect one was the incredibly helpful and polite staff, the high standard of service and also the convenient and attractive location. I would definitely recommend staying at this hotel- it would only make your stay at Istanbul even more pleasurable!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel to stay, near all the sights”
Reviews.Author: Sevda B
Reviews.Content: We have 10 days remained in the GÃ¼lhane park hotel in Istanbul, The hotel is clean and tidy. The staff are very warm, nice and welcoming for all visitors. All staff speak good English. The hotel is located in The center of all interesting places to visit. The hotel looks very cared off. Rooms are pleasant to stay in. The service offered by the hotel is at a very high level. High degree of willingness to help you with all your questions and advise. The food was though for my taste. The location in the city is optimal, within walking distance of most major sights, but also close to the ferries to the other side of the city to come. We enjoyed our stay very much. I absolutely recommend this hotel for everyone. Sevda Batur From Netherlands

Reviews.Title: “about gulhane park stay”
Reviews.Author: pjanakiraman
Reviews.Content: A good hotel to stay in. Very central. Walking distance to a number of attactions. very courteous staff. At the front office, Mr VEYSEL was very informative, went out of the way to assist and keep guests happy. At the same time Mr IRFAN was very jolly, humming music and interacting with guests who came down for breakfast and helpful. In all a very comfortable stay except for one downer: Guests should not expect more than on 500 ml water bottel per room irrespective of the number of people in the room and the duration of stay. That goes of Tea/Coffee too. The hotel provides you only one bottle and the tea/coffee sachets on arrival only. The rest one has to pay for. Wish they provide water and tea/coffee sachets every day!!

Reviews.Title: “Better than we expected”
Reviews.Author: saeidmehdinezhad
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel from february 2 to 8 of 2012 with my 3 Iranian friends for a business trip.beforehand I sent e-mails to 5different hotels in Istanbul.The most polite answer and best price came from this hotel.Thanks to Mr onal.The location of this hotel is so great,it's near to most of Istanbul's tourist attractions and railway station also close to IDO(istanbul chamber of commerce..All the staffs are polite,friendly and helpful specially Vaysal in the reception desk.also Bayram and Arif and a gentleman who I can't remember his name with a natural smile on his face. The room and beds are clean and comfortable.When there was a problem with our safe box, they fixed it in just 10 minutes.The gulhane area is calm and there is no noise at nights so we could sleep well.Breakfast was nice,colorful, sanitary and varied.But there was some shortages in this hotel that I should mention:when we took shower, the water was leaking from beneath of basin to the ground.Also the hotel offers a tea bag in the first day of stay to all of guests but it wouldn't continue for the next days.We bought a box of teabag from a nearby supermarket and offered to other guests of hotel who were complained about the matter.Alltogether we were satisfied of our 6days stay in this hotel and if we have a chance to go to Istanbul again,we prefer to stay in gulhane park hotel with no doubt. special thanks to Mr onal (who I coulldn't meet him face to face)and Mr vaysal (a very handsome and polite gentleman who helped us to find an airplane ticket for one of my friends who changed his schedule of returning to Iran)

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Staffs”
Reviews.Author: fadhjonker
Reviews.Content: Stayed there with my beloved family & wife. Enjoyed with friendly staffs there, like Veysel & Irfan which we are more familiar with. Thank you for making us comfy in your hotel. Stayed there 5 - 7 February 2012.

Reviews.Title: “Quality at great prices.”
Reviews.Author: Stu D
Reviews.Content: Myself and my partner stayed at The Gulhane Park Hotel for a 3 night weekend break. Having selected and booked hotels online in the past, only to be disappointed by quality, standards, staff, location etc, I have to say we have nothing but praise for this hotel. From the excellent central location, the helpful staff, clean, spacious rooms.To the more than adequate breakfast, which was included in the surprisingly competitive price, this hotel has it all in abundance! Cannot recommend The Gulhane Park and very friendly staff, enough. A must try if visiting Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Meltem B
Reviews.Content: It's a great hotel to stay. The location was good, food was amazing and the rooms were comfortable. The staff was very friendly, special thanks to Bayram and Irfan. They were very kind and polite.

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: sami a
Reviews.Content: I stayed this hotel and it was excellent the room was very big and clean. Special thank to mr.bayram. I recommend this excellent hotel

Reviews.Title: “Winter holiday”
Reviews.Author: Pekka S
Reviews.Content: Me and my wife were 5 nights at hotel. Staff was very friendly in every situation. Boyram was so kind to arrange us a driver back to airport and helping us with many advice. Especially Veysel showed his helpfulness from the very beginning. We felt like we were taking care as VIP-guests, when he always seemed to notice us. Good sence of humor he had. Breakfast was exellent with so many different kind of warm and cold food.

Reviews.Title: “very very good”
Reviews.Author: charlyKent
Reviews.Content: I have stayed 2 nights in this hotel, hotel was amazing, the food was great, the rooms was comfortable and clean, had a good location,Tramlines just 2 minutes walk from the hotel. Staff is very frendly, no fake faces:)(specialy BAYRAM my favarite) I would recomended this hotel to people who will go to Istanbul. You will not be dissapointed with gulhane park hotel. REGARDS FROM ENGLAND ..MR:SHEN

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel With Good Location”
Reviews.Author: tawfek63
Reviews.Content: A great hotel to stay - comfortable room especially during winter season. The staff was also great. Quite near to public transport. Special thanks to Bayram & Irfan for their hospitality.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: Julien_Cetin
Reviews.Content: I was go to Gulhane Park Hotel in january. It was a good experience and i will return surely ! The staff is welcoming and always present. The room was cleaned every day. More over, the hotel is very well located approximated of the blue mosque. A big thanks for Bayram and Atilla for their great kindness.

Reviews.Title: “Whas a great trip”
Reviews.Author: Julide A
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for everything, you guys made our holiday memorable. All of the staff was really nice and friendly. Our favourite person was Veysel, he was nice and kind and he was helpful, we want to thank everyone and hopefully see you all soon.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Comfortable and Friendly Hotel in An Excellent Location.”
Reviews.Author: Brian S
Reviews.Content: This hotel was booked for us by an agency as an overnight stop prior to departure on a five week self guided tour. The room on the first floor was quiet small but comfortable. Tea/coffee making facilities were provided but no UHL milk in the fridge. The bathroom had been refurbished to a high standard with an excellent range of toiletries. The TV in the room was minuscule and could not be viewed at any distance. Breakfast was enjoyable with plenty of variety to suit most tastes. Reception staff were friendly and helpful. We decided not to rebook for our weeks's stay in Istanbul in a month's time as we felt it would be difficult to be relaxed and really comfortable during an extended stay.

Reviews.Title: “soner veysel”
Reviews.Author: ayeshasohail
Reviews.Content: your staff was very kind and friendly. veysel is very nice and friendly person.the manger is so good and nice. i liked your hotel. i would advice people to go to your hotel.from mr/mrs sohail +areej thanks

Reviews.Title: “Great value and a very warm welcome”
Reviews.Author: Doug M
Reviews.Content: A very friendly welcome and excellent service. The tea on arrival was especially appreciated. The staff could not be more helpful and were able to arrange taxis for us to and from the airport which was a great help to some one with no Turkish langauge. The location is brilliant with many of Istanbul's great tourist attractions within walking distance. The rooms were clean and comfortable and breakfast provided a wide variety of food to satisfy most tastes. All in all a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Soner and Fasial”
Reviews.Author: Zunara
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for everything, you guys made our holiday memorable. All of the staff was really nice and friendly. Our favourite person was Fasial, he was nice and kind and he was helpful, we want to thank everyone and hopefully see you all soon. Also we liked to thank the manager he was nice and it was good talking to him. we are definitely going to recommend this hotel to our friends and family. :) Thank you once again it was great fun. We got Arif to smile in the end which was good. Best regards Zunara, Rubina (Mum) and Mariam. I am definitely missing Turkey :) (Zunara)

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing value and unethical”
Reviews.Author: PapaKiloTX
Reviews.Content: Hotel refused to give me the room that I paid for, and put me in a room next to elevator. Soundproofing is terrible, climate control did not work, and plumbing is extremely noisy - you can hear the plumbing for multiple rooms, as well as the upper floor. The hotel does not even provide a chair in the room. Staff was polite however, and cleanliness (housekeeping) was good. The hotel location is ideal - very close to main attractions, and yet away from the hustle-bustle of noisy streets.

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Clean and friendly staffs”
Reviews.Author: Jean2011324
Reviews.Content: We stay at Gulhane Park Hotel before and after out cruise and had great service. Both time our rooms were roomy and clean. Front desk were friendly and helpful. They help book our shuttle to the airport and help us getting around Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “So Disappointing!”
Reviews.Author: beemvg
Reviews.Content: Chose this hotel on the strength of positive reviews on tripadvisor. I have just returned from a 4 night stay and I'm sorry to say I could not recommend this hotel. The hotel experience took away from my otherwise very enjoyable visit to Istanbul. It started right at check in when the duty manager mixed up our reservation, saying we had booked twin beds, until I could see nationality 'japanese' and realised he was looking at wrong booking. I felt he was pushing boat cruise and didn't spend enough time with general directions and orientation. Overheard another duty manager checking in guests and it was done much more efficiently and with greater care. First impressions are so important and ours fell short. It took us 2 days to realise just how close we were to the main sights because of his oversight! The 'superior' double room is very small and apart from one soft stool, it doesn't have any seating. Small seating space around check- in desk not conducive to lounging around so not a good hotel to spend time in other than a place to lay your head. I have never had an issue with breakfast before, there has always been something I could eat, but only had 2 breakfasts, and that was 2 too many.... orange drink was vile and coffee unpleasant. Apart from bread and jam, there was nothing I could eat. Cheese tomatoes, olives, hard boiled eggs sprinkled with dried herbs are not foods that i relish for breakfast. I didn't find any of the Duty Managers particularly helpful. I tried and failed to do my return flight check in, on-line, on a laptop in the lobby with a Manager behind the desk in front of me. He offered me no assistance with the very slow, non functioning computer and I had to head down the street to local internet cafe to complete the task! Four star hotel???? Not for me!

Reviews.Title: “A perfect hotel choice”
Reviews.Author: Samantha W
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from 5 days in Istanbul, travelling alone. Gulhane Park Hotel was absolutely perfect, I loved it. It was like coming home every evening, a peaceful haven, just the right size, comfortable, lovely room, friendly staff and wide breakfast choice in the mornings. The hotel check-in was 24 hours and given my flight muddle ups this was not only great, but the hotel staff were excellent in dealing with me on the phone from the airport to work out changes of arrival. The staff spoke English, which was one of the reasons I chose the hotel too. Veysel on reception was especially cheerful, helpful and friendly which really made my stay at the hotel even more enjoyable. It was also ideally situated for both sides of the Golden Horn, so going to sights in Sultanahmet and surrounds or Galata and Beyoglu was easy by foot or tram, and walking to Eyup and Galatasaray was also easy to do. There was a great little cafe across from the hotel for a great Turkish coffee at the beginning or end of the day, and a little bar next door. I loved the street up from the hotel running alongside Gulhane Park too, it felt like 'my' street with great little shops and lovely shopkeepers. What a great trip it was all in all. I would definitely go back to this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “October 2011 trip - 10 out of 10!”
Reviews.Author: Tarkan01
Reviews.Content: We had a splendid stay at the Gulhane Park Hotel. A group of us were staying there for a family do and all agreed we'd made a great choice. We arrived later than the rest of the group on the red eye from Heathrow, but the hotel had our pick up sorted and did everything to make sure we were in our room as soon as one became available, well before the normal check in time. The staff were friendly and very helpful, looking after everything for us from taxis to printing boarding cards. We couldn't praise them enough. The hotel's location is fantastic if your main aim is to visit the old city, most of the main tourist sites are a short walk away. Our room was clean and spacious, with maybe our only criticism being that it was very warm at night, even with the air con on. But that's only a minor point. The only meals we ate at the hotel were our breakfasts, but there was plenty to choose from and if anything we probably over did it! To cap it all, our transfer back to the airport managed to deliver us half an hour early for check in, through evening rush hour Istanbul traffic. That must be a record. Thanks to Bayram Bey and all the staff at Gulhane Park. Ã§ok Ã§ok teÅŸekkÃ¼r ederiz

Reviews.Title: “Oct. 25.-28.2011”
Reviews.Author: heikki_soininen
Reviews.Content: I like to thank all the staff and especially Mr Bayram. Our visit was indeed pleasent in your hotel - breakfest was very good and all the staff really polite and helpful. Special thanks to Mr Bayram, he helped us very well in planning our program.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, breakfast disappointing”
Reviews.Author: andrew1NorthWales
Reviews.Content: The good stuff first. The hotel is efficiently run and clean. The bedroom was well sized and quiet. The staff do not hassle you (other than the initial special price tour of Istanbul 65 Euros each!) and are polite and helpful. The location is its major asset - perfect for the top attractions. The area it is located in is pleasant enough and near to a range of good restaurants. There is free access to the internet in the reception area. I would describe the hotel as 3 stars. It lacked the finesse for anything more. The restaurant is only adequate - the food is basic and unvaried. I was bored with it on my first morning, and it did not get any better. This was disappointing given the high standard of food found in the city (it costs 15 Euros if you pay for it). You have to pay extra for expresso coffee and fresh orange juice (come on Gulhane Park - make it free). The mini-bar is typically expensive and the hotel only wants to be paid in Euros. The toilet next to the restaurant has a horrible smell as if the drains are not functioning properly - avoid. Lastly, the air conditioning in the room was not powerful enough - we were too hot even in late October. Perhaps this was an issue just in our room. The rack rate was 380 Euros per night (tripple room) which is nonsense - I paid 100 Euros by shopping online. Still, its a safe bet and I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Empty promises”
Reviews.Author: Matravel133333
Reviews.Content: We booked one week at the Gulhane Park Hotel in Oct 2011. We have arranged transport from the airport to the hotel with the general manager. Several emails confirmed that we will be picked up from the hotel. On arrival there was no one to collect us. We called the hotel and they could not tell us anything about our agreement to be collected from the airport. They promised to call us back at the airport. It did not happen and we called several times more. Every time the same promise. Two hours later we took a taxi to the hotel. On arrival we were told that the vehicle that was supposed to collect us, broke down. The staff were more interested to sell us tours of the city than rendering a service to the guests. We also booked a double bed which we did not get. Every day we were told perhaps tomorrow. Finally we checked out of the hotel without receiving a refund on our payment. We moved to the hotel next door where we had no problem what so ever.

Reviews.Title: “brilliant hotel,staff and location”
Reviews.Author: Dennis49
Reviews.Content: We could not fault this hotel. It's clean, modern, spacious and in an ideal location for sight seeing and checking out the surrounding area. The staff are friendly, polite and efficient. Many thanks to all the staff. 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: “Hatim Kader”
Reviews.Author: HK1176
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from Istanbul after a stay of five days at this hotel. The location is fantastic, all the top attractions are within 10 min walk of the hotel and so is the tram stop. The high light of our stay was without doubt the staff at the hotel. Friendly, polite and always service with a smile. Irfan the restaurant manager arranged a meal for the 7 of us on the roof at a moments notice,Bayram & Han were so helpful.... we had a wonderful time and I shall stay in this hotel when I return in March. Many thanks to Mr Onal and all the staff for looking after us old folks! Hatim Kader

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service. Will not get what you booked”
Reviews.Author: Riosal
Reviews.Content: I just came back from a stay in this hotel and i urge you to avoid it. I arrived late at night to be told there was a water problem And i had to stay down the road at a three star hotel. I had paid for a four star but it was late. The following day the gave me a double room which was adequate but bottom in the four star quality. After a stay in capadocia for one night i went back to this hotel. They gave a room with twins. I said i had booked a double, but they said they only had twins left. Again at night, so not much i could do. I called agent the next day and they promised him they woul solve it. When i arrived that afternoon they had done nothing. Overall, i paid for 4 nights in a double room in a four star hotel. Got one night of what i booked, two nights in twins and one night elsewhere. They are arrogant and aware you can do nothing if you have prepaid.

Reviews.Title: “A hotel with space in a great location and breakfast roof top!”
Reviews.Author: 23aj
Reviews.Content: We stayed here twice in September and would stay there again if we were in Istanbul. Fabulous location, helpful staff and a rooftop breakfast area that you have to pinch yourself to believe it! Coupled with spacious rooms a good price, why stay elsewhere! And you can even find it again after getting lost wondering in the great streets and lanes that surround!

Reviews.Title: “The single best place to stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: MedPeds
Reviews.Content: A phenomenal hotel, graciously located in the old Istanbul within walking distance of Haga Sophia, the blue mosque, the Topkapi palace, the spice bazaar, the grand bazaar,etc. It has included breakfast which is very fresh and healthy with a gorgeous view of the Gulhane park and the Bosphorus. Tuna Han is one of the hosts who is the most friendly and professional person, always ready to answer questions and give advice. A nice feature of the hotel is that you can come in Metro from the airport, take the metro and change station in Zetinburnu and get off in Gulhane. The hotel is 2 minutes away walking from the metro stop.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!”
Reviews.Author: Stewart K
Reviews.Content: Staff friendly and super helpful. Location close to great attractions, food, entertainment and shopping and those not close -150 m. from the city tram. Breakfast wonderful but did not eat other meals there - others did and said OK -- has daily dinner specials, reasonable. At time of visit, construction in area but hotel always clean -- it even snowed one day and staff kept place immaculate. Room smaller but nice, furniture stout - close to antique, baths super modern. LOVED ISTANBUL AND PEOPLE which made hotel even better. Top floor overlooks T Palace wall into Gulgane Pk also can see mosques, city, river. Was there 2 weeks, wanted to stay longer. TV had 500+ channels in 20 languages, REALLY enjoyed/learned from it. Hotel has computer - Turkish keyboards/internet quirky...

Reviews.Title: “we definatley be back”
Reviews.Author: Numan S
Reviews.Content: we liked everything about the hotel. the young gentleman in the reception by name of Bayram is a credit to this hotel, he very kindly dealt with all our questions with no problem at all, very helpfull. I must give credit to the restaurant staff, they were fantastic Numan from UK.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Syed H
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 9 nights in July 2011. The hotel is very clean and perfect location. The staff are very friendly and very helpful. Bayram at the front desk was especially helpful in planning our tours, dinners and any other services we needed at the hotel. He was very kind and gave great advice. The rooms are very clean and modern and has nice new washrooms and the location is ideal as it is close to 2 tram stations but away from the main busy and noisy streets.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent! In All directions by again soon!”
Reviews.Author: Carlo O
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a fantastic location. 10 minutes walk from the main attractions (St. Sophia, Blue Mosque, Cistern) with the nearby park if the heat becomes too strong. Breakfast good for those who love the salty, a little less varied for those who love the sweet. Attentive and prepared staff. The morning hall porter (Bayram) is SUPER. He gave me many ideas to explore the city.Always pleasant and helpful. I can not wait to go back to Gulhane Park to review friend found there

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for family holidays or couples”
Reviews.Author: Antonio A
Reviews.Content: The treatment they have provided has been excellent. The hotel staff was very friendly. Clean and with a full breakfast, varied, and a terrace with views over Istanbul. The rooms are very spacious. The very good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “The best vacation we've ever had.”
Reviews.Author: Cyrus k
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff in this hotel are very friendly and helpful., They make you feel very welcome and they are truly lovely people. This is a family run hotel and I must say it is operating very professionally with great care and management is just perfect. You will feel safe and secure in this hotel. My family and I highly recommend this hotel with great pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: evierochdale
Reviews.Content: friendly staff clean rooms in a quiet area but about 500 hundred yards from all the main sites of istanbul .breakfast was on the roof top with lovely views of the mosques on one side & on the other you can see the bospherous sea

Reviews.Title: “we loved gulhanpark and sure we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: amelll
Reviews.Content: we spent 5 nights at gulhanpark hote in july 2011l!! it was wonderfull, the rooms clean with a very friendly and helpfull staff thank you bayan!!! the geografic situation is excellent you can visit all istanbul, the tramway station is at 1 min walking and blue mosque and aya sophia 5 minutes walk everythig you want to do become easy !! enjoy your holidays in gulhanpark !!! you are the best thank you. AMEL

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value top class hotel!”
Reviews.Author: vinnie57
Reviews.Content: Following a stay a few months previously in a "so-called" 4-5* in Bodrum, possibly one of the worst hotels i've ever stayed in (Azka hotel), i arrived at Gulhane Park with a little caution. There was a lot of work going on in the street (they were re-laying the road & paving), and i immediately thought "oho"!. All unfounded. Was very, very pleasantly surprised. Compared to much of the accomm in Istanbul, the rooms were huge and nicely furnished. The room had everything, mini-bar, kettle, free safe, bathrobes, slippers and (a first for me), not only sat tv, but your own personal digi-box so you could set up the channels you wanted, and not rely on what the hotel decided. Breakfast was excellent, with a good variety of hot/cold items. Nice roof terrace with view up to Hagia Sophia. Very central, only 6 mins walk to Sultanahmet and al the main sights, and about 8/10 min walk to Sirceki and the Bosphorus. Located right next to Gulhane Park, nice relaxing area to sit and take in the sun. Surrounded by scores of very good restaurants, some mentioned in Rough Guide (and with good reason). The hotel was very comfortable, clean and peaceful. Highly recommended. Would def be my first choice when i return to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “It was awesome !”
Reviews.Author: ameyajoshi
Reviews.Content: Great views, nice and clean rooms, friendly staff Informative lobby area and helpful people.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hoitel and Friendly halpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Thecyprustwo
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for a total of six days. It was a wonderful experience. The owners were friendly and helpful . But the most outstanding were the two men on reception.Tuna and Bayram. They both helped us amazingly and we became good friends. We are looking forward to another trip in the near future. We can recommend this hotel and staff 100%

Reviews.Title: “We really enjoyed our stay in the hotel and will be there again.”
Reviews.Author: shahbaz157
Reviews.Content: i went to istanbul on 22nd of june 2011,it was my first trip to istanbul and was accompanied by my two children and wife.I booked the hotel well before my travel dates and at the time of booking the hotel manager required my visa card no.I told him i do`nt have visa card,he accepted my request and booked for 3 nights. We arrived istanbul airport on sunday noon and hotel transport was was waiting for us and we were brought to hotel. The reception was really quick cooperative and efficient,,they gave us a family room, the room was very clean, spacious and with a terrace towards street. The room service was excellent, the breakfast was satisfactory,with variety of foods in the morning. The staff of the hotel and especially mr. soner was really cooperative in any kind of assistance we needed. The location of the hotel was excellent as it was few steps from tram station gulhane park,, from where you can take tram towards taksim, or towards blue moque or grand bazar. Egyption bazar and sirkeci tram station were also a few steps from hotel. There were many restaurants down there near the hotel,, with variety of foods. If someone wants to enjoy mc donald food it right opposite to sirkeci tram station,we have been going there by foot,as it is 2-3 minutes walk from hotel. Hotel also provided wifi free of charge in room and in lobby In my opinion it is the best choice to stay in istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “great place, nice helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: malGOrzata77
Reviews.Content: Delightful location close to everywhere: Hagia Sophia, train station, good food, buses, trams, Galata Bridge. Quiet, intimate night. Great views from the breakfast patio. A delicious, hearty breakfast. Late evenings on a quiet music in front of the restaurant - now we miss her. Nice helpful, smiling staff, especially likable Mr. Tuna. Very good site. Renovation of the street almost finite, there is a huge hassle

Reviews.Title: “An amazing hotel and a brilliant stay with super staff”
Reviews.Author: raymal4u
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean, fresh and cosy, Staff were caring and responded to any needs that we had. Shuttel was arranged with no problems. Morning breakfast was of a 5 start standard, was lovely.

Reviews.Title: “A Real Terrible Nightmare”
Reviews.Author: Ahmed_Mostafa
Reviews.Content: One of the worst hotels that I had stayed in during any of my trips to Istanbul, I stayed for only night then I ran away from that terrible nightmare to stay in another hotel. I had booked a room through the internet according to hotel's reviews & photos gallery in the hotel's website, everything was fine until the moment of visiting the hotel where I found there are very large differences in hotel's description on the internet (4 Stars), than reality (2 Stars). I got so many problems at checkin where they didn't provide me the room that I booked but they promised me they would offer another room after that night, Next day they offered the same room but in another floor, I had also got alot of troubles & shouting at checkout because I simply decided to leave the hotel after just one night when they didn't offer what they had promised. 1- The hotel's staff were rude and not polite at all, they don't even know how to smile when they talk to you, they made me feel that hotel's guests are their enemies. 2- The service were terrible & unprofessional at all Special mention to General Manager & Receptionists. 3- The rooms were really tight, smelly, dusty & crazily noisy because the view of all rooms windows in front of a public dirty parking, the A/C not working, I had never slept at the end. 4- The hotel is located in an alley, it's unsafe area specially at night as well as it's hard to reach the location by all available transportation. 5- Breakfast is extremely low quality, boring choices, the breakfast taste is terrible and not fresh as well as the breakfast's room were small, noisy & dirty (it's not such a restaurant). 6- They have Room Service, but they don't answer your calls to serve you most of time. 7- The value of money is really high comparing to the terrible service they providing. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone, I only recommend escaping to feel more enjoyment during your trip to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “fine, clean, perfectly located”
Reviews.Author: giulio_caroni
Reviews.Content: hotel is really well located in the old city, very easy to reach touristic sites, staff was very helpful and kind, room was large, proper and clean. A few little things could be improved: no night table lamps, no clothes-pegs in the bathroom. Poor view on a garage very nice view from the terrace

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff and very helpful”
Reviews.Author: m0stafa60
Reviews.Content: its was our first visit to turkey we were lucky to choose Gulhane park hotel because its very well situated , all the famous sites are at walking distance, FATIMA LONDON

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Staff”
Reviews.Author: PerthAngie
Reviews.Content: We unfortunately only stayed one night at this hotel in April. It is in a great location, close to the Blue Mosque and great eating places. The staff were the highlight of the stay, they attended to everything we requested promptly and were great natured. When our shuttle to SAW did not arrive on time at 6.20am (organised by the hotel for 13 euros each), they were the ones ringing the company immediately, and then another follow up 10mins later, before we even requested it. My only constructive feedback would be that the drains in the shower didn't drain very quickly, and that the towels had seen better days, but other than that, we had a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but beware of service compromise”
Reviews.Author: iqralearning
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not located in an attractive area and took us over an hour to arrive from Sabiha Gokcen airport due to the traffic and narrow alleys. There are works and construction going out directly outside the hotel which can be noisy at times and inaccessible. Inside the hotel the lobby, restaurant and rooms are clean and tidy, befitting a 4 star hotel. We paid and booked for 10 rooms and everything was confirmed by email; but when we arrived to our horror the manager Mr. Sonar said that they only have 9 rooms left and have put extra (portable spring beds - very uncomfortable) into the rooms to accommodate for the additional guests. We were NOT happy about this. Overbooking is not uncommon at this hotel. In the end one of our guests had to sleep in the changing room area of the Hammam and Sauna! After 2 days had passed, they no longer serviced or cleaned our rooms anymore. The bathroom toiletries were not topped up and the rooms were left as they were, resulting in beds not made, tea cups unclean and running out of Shampoo. The sink and shower plug holes are always blocking up! So the rooms are clean and pleasing when you arrive, but soon decay! Wifi is included for free which is a bonus. The Topkapi, Aya Sofya and Sulten Ahmet are all within walking distance saving you taxi fares. There are plenty of restaurants and some may want to visit McDonalds which is around the corner. The hotel also provides a menu for in room service which is not that expensive. We recommend this hotel for couples on a small-average budget. For large groups I would not recommend it due to our experience based on feedback from 29 people. Overall a nice hotel but be very wary of compromise and nitty gritty issues plus additional costs that you may incur at the end of your stay. You may have to chase up room service and toiletries if you want your room cleaned daily. Unfortunately, this hotel has so much potential, let down by the constant feeling that they want to squeeze out of you as much as they can. Compliments go along way with guests. Overall 7/10

Reviews.Title: “good location with frindly staff”
Reviews.Author: ramin0
Reviews.Content: when we arrived at midnight accepted us friendly and warm and we was comftable in room with everything in that but the room was little and wasnot very big size and our beds was seperate.we walk to topkopy and ayasoofya and grand bazar

Reviews.Title: “Great location and very helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: Worldtravelers020
Reviews.Content: We spend 4 nights here. All highlights are within walking distance. The tram for longdistance is also nearby. Nice rooms, good service, breakfast was complete and lots of choice. Although there wasn't a real handicap room available, it was very well manageable with the wheelchair. Also thanks to the great staff and management.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Csilla65
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a good choice. Room is big and clean. Staff is excellent. They offered many programs (Tour by boat, Turkish night...etc) Buffet breakfast is abundant. The hotel is really close to the famous sights. The roofterrace is amazing!

Reviews.Title: “Central location, good place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: RichardTk
Reviews.Content: We stayed three nights in the hotel and were very pleased. The hotel is located within walking distance of the major mosques and the Grand Bazaar. The hotel was clean, the staff attentive, especially the woman who ran the help desk. The breakfast buffet was amazing, filled with a wide assortment of tasty morsels. We arrived from Rome, having acquired gastrointestinal difficulties while in Italy. These expressed themselves upon arrival in Turkey and the staff was especially solicitous to our needs. There is a generalized airport shuttle pick-up available though we did not use it as we had other arrangements. We will be returning to Istanbul in another month and hope to stay there again. Only one caveat. We had laundry done. This is sent out to a private concern and the cost was excessive. Not the hotel's fault, but you should be aware of it. We do not believe you will be disappointed should you stay here. Richard and Cyndy

Reviews.Title: “Friendly service, some small annoyances”
Reviews.Author: Etheri
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Gulhane Park Hotel for 5 days with a group of 4 men. Good things: - Hotel employees were really nice and friendly for us. - Quite good location, lots of restaurants and attractions nearby. - Sauna (and self-service Hamam) in the hotel - Free Wifi - Quite decent breakfast - Room was cleaned every day when we were in the breakfast even we didn't tell anyone to clean it or anything. This is just amazing. Many thanks to the cleaners! Bad things: - Sauna wasn't free. Paying for sauna is really strange for a Finnish person but yes, it's our own fault that we didn't notice the fee before actually going to the sauna twice :) - Our room was the last one on the corridor and the Wifi didn't work very well. Also, the speed wasn't that great. Sure, we did have multiple laptops online at the same time and streaming music from Spotify etc. - Fresh orange juice costs 5 liras in the breakfast when you can get similar stuff with 1 lira from outside. - There was probably something wrong with the air conditioner as even we put the temperature to 5 degrees celcius, there was still like 30 degrees in the night so we didn't really get much sleep. We did turn off the air conditioner for one night and it wasn't hot anymore but then the air got very moist. But, we didn't complain about the air conditioner to the reception so this is mostly also our own fault. - Hotel has the slowest elevator in the world. You can take stairs twice in the same time as it takes to use the elevator. - Water pressure in the shower was pretty low. Ok, there was more things listed in the bad things than in the good things but for the price we payed, I think it was actually pretty good. Also, the bad things are actually pretty small issues. Overall, I would still recommend the hotel, I've seen so much worse hotels in other countries :)

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic central Hotel; excellent location, services etc. no complaints!”
Reviews.Author: awatea55
Reviews.Content: Arrived at Hotel, and were greeed by the staff at Reception and handed a complimentary drink. Our bags were promptly taken up to the room. Rooms were very clean upon arrival, and were cleaned / serviced every day! Very good range of food for breakfast, from traditional english style to turkish. We ate out each day for lunch / dinner ... but the menu at the Hotal was very good, and prices compared well with local places. The best thing about this hotel was the location: everything - historical attractions - were within a 10 - 15 mins walking distance from the hotel. You could whip back to hotel ... then head out again! They even provide airport pickup drop off at a reasonable rate! Had a lovely sauna, and Turkish Bath, at a cost, and a gym which was free of charge. Best thing ... FREE wifi throughout the hotel which was just fantasic ... if you have an iPhone ;-) The staff both at breakfast and on Reception were very very friendly and helpful. Would certainly go there again.

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: mira023
Reviews.Content: I liked the Gulhane Park Hotel very much. He is very well situated in a quiet area, near Topkapi Palace and Hagia Sophia. The manager and staff are very helpfull and friendly. The rooms are very clean and the breakfast is various. I really recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: SuzyQSSS
Reviews.Content: After a long day of travel problems and last minute changes due to strikes in Greece, arriving at this hotel was wonderful. It was safe, clean, comfortable, and with helpful English-speaking staff at the front desk. They kept the rooftop restaurant open late for us to eat dinner and drink wine that night. Included breakfast was wonderful! Street noise is present, but not too disturbing at night. Great location - walkign distance to multiple restaurants and attractions.

Reviews.Title: “great experience,very friendly and helpful staff,great location and very clean!”
Reviews.Author: topolino1984
Reviews.Content: we booked the hotel with last minute.com. we spent 4 night in istanbul and the hotel was very good in everything u need for ashort stay!very friendly staff,clean room,quite hotel,great location.the staff are very helpfull in sightseeing and whatever u need for your stay!breakfast was really good !

Reviews.Title: “It was a great time!”
Reviews.Author: michaela_schmid
Reviews.Content: nice staff, perfect service, great room facilities, a good gym, all staff-member told every request from the eyes, very clean, a good value for money, W-lan connection in every room, nice bed, i will come soon, thank you for the great service, i feel very well. Greetings from munich. Michi nice staff, perfect service, great room facilities, a good gym, all staff-member told every request from the eyes, very clean, a good value for money, W-lan connection in every room, nice bed, i will come soon, thank you for the great service, i feel very well. Greetings from munich. Michi

Reviews.Title: “Nice and great location”
Reviews.Author: MauriceW77
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel with friendly staff in a great location. Rooms are ok but nothing special. It's Turkish cleanness so what do you expect! For bars and nightlife it's better to stay in Taksim area.

Reviews.Title: “Decent enough hotel that is value for money”
Reviews.Author: puzhitao
Reviews.Content: Many has reviewed this hotel and generally the feedback is good. My opinion, it is decent, not as great as some painted it to be but surely value for money. ok i will just keep it to some key information to keep it up to date 1. Room is indeed a little small for my party of 5. I booked a "Superior" quad room but there is nothing "Superior" abt it. What i got is a room with a double and a single and then slide another single next to the toilet. However, i got it for 87 euro per night for my family of 5 (2 adults and 3 young children) so dun think i can complain too much. 2. Breakfast is decent. Mostly cold stuff with cereal and 3 hot items. Hot items ran out quickly and was slow to top up. Breakfast time is from 7:30am to 10:30am. If you go there past 10am please expect most of the hot items to be gone. 3. Location is great and many has mentioned that. It is 200m from tram station. Few steps away is a small shop that sell u water, titbits and cigarette. Gifts shops little around the area. 4. Food outlet nearby the hotel is all within 500m. You can get local or fast food nearby 5. Staff generally friendly and helpful. Call to recept get a response pretty fast. No one pushing me to buy any tour packages. 6. Internet is free. For the first 2 nights it came on and off but later on it was more stable. Generally the speed is slow but it is free so no complains from me. There is also a notebook at the lobby connected to the internet free of use

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: mberelowitz
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in a great location and within walking distance of all the major sites. It is in a quiet area, but don't expect any views from the room. The rooms are clean and have everything you need including minibar, satelite TV & safe (which is very useful). The breakfast is excellent with plenty of variety & fresh produce. There is a PC in the lobby which is very useful for checking information - great value for money

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel and Service In Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Srehemtulla
Reviews.Content: We came with our Family from London and we have been treated like royality. The front desk staff was very polite and friendly. They bent over backwards to help in any manner they can. Assistance in cabs rides, the best tours of Istanbul and favourable places to eat. The staff fell in love with our young daughter and made us feel very comforable. I wish Hotels around the world were like this. when i come back to Istanbul the only place i would stay is GulhanePark Hotel. This Hotel is located Centerally to all the sites and points of interst in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “location ok, service bad”
Reviews.Author: geer5771
Reviews.Content: hotel is located in old city, close to attractions and small restaurants (tip: Hafiz Ahmet in street behind hotel: verry good food and atmosphere) diner is bad, breakfast ok, coffee bad, rooms ok, roomservice forgot us once, airco not working, which means sleeping with open window and al the noises from outside, drinks expensive, and no airport transfer although they promise this on the website. Wifi and internet slow and not working properly

Reviews.Title: “We have stayed in various hotels worldwide. This hotel provided the best service.”
Reviews.Author: rdacunha
Reviews.Content: Family from Canada were spending their holiday with us in London. We visited Istanbul and stayed at The Gulhane Park Hotel. The manager, his deputy and staff were probably the best bunch of people any one staying at a hotel could wish to meet. They were very helpful, nothing was too much. We had a young girl of 16 months in our party and she "fell in love with them as much as they fell in love with her" The manager offered to drive us to the airport when we left, saving us the cost of a taxi! The hotel is excellent - The rooms are very clean, roomy & comfortable, it is close to shops and attractions, and the service is of the highest standard.

Reviews.Title: “Go to Istanbul to stay at the Gulhane Park Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Luckynomad
Reviews.Content: Istanbul is an amazing city. Although my family and I were halfway around the world from Los Angeles, we felt at home at the Gulhane Park Hotel. The hotel is walking distance from all the must-see sites. The staff provided transportation to pick us up at the airport and brought us into their hotel and our new home for the week were were in Istanbul. The staff made us feel like family and were very accomdating. I felt as if I lived in Istanbul and my friends happen to work at the hotel. The breakfast was delicious and an introduction to the delicious food that awaited us in the city. The free internet and loner computers made it easy to send messages and arrange our future travels. The staff was very informative, the views of the near by park from the rooms, and the quality customer service and attention made our trip to Istanbul unforgettable.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Dinka007
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel with friendly and helpful staff. All our wishes and request they have been listen carefully and do the best that we feel pleasant and safe. Rooms are with enough space and daily light. Clean and neat. All historic areas are in walking distance. If I ever go again to Istanbul they will be my choice No. 1.

Reviews.Title: “Good location, friendly staff....”
Reviews.Author: Memories10
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a clean, small but very comfortable hotel then Gulhane Park is an excellent choise for your stay in Istanbul. The hotel is located very close to all major attractions in a very quiet street. Rooms are very clean, large and comfortable. Hotel staff is very friendly and ready to help you in any situation. Although we did not spend too much time in the hotel, I can say that I could definitely recommend this hotel even for a longer stay in this beautiful city.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and wonderful staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: Nedim_Tz
Reviews.Content: I spent 6 days with my colleagues in this great Hotel. Hotel position is great (everything is walking distance). You can reach all important things, Blue Mosque 5 minutes, Grand Bazar 15 minutes, Spice Bazar 10 minutes... It is very nice when you wake up in the morning and look throw the room window and you see tourist walking to "Saray Top Kapi" or other main monuments and you are 5 meters from this walls and 5 minutes walking from Hotel :)) Food is good, staff is great and good English speaking. I would recommend Gulhane Park Hotel to everybody.

Reviews.Title: “Rude unconcerned staff and bad surroundings”
Reviews.Author: drvarunkapoor
Reviews.Content: The hotel is more like a 2-3 star hotel in vicinity of auto parts shops. The blower and AC was not working in the room which felt more like an oven and soffocated. moreover on repeated requests the reception person Mr Kadsir was downright rude. EVen talking to their manager was of of no help FINALLY WE GAVE UP and kept awake through the night. The worst was when we contacted the manager again in the morning his reply was ' THESE THINGS HAPPEN WORLD OVER" dont fuss over it.. My advise to anyone visiting Gulhane park hotel is that be careful these people are not bothered about your comfort.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in good location”
Reviews.Author: MarinoSo
Reviews.Content: Good hotel near the main sights in the Sultanahmet district. Rooms are spacius, clean and new. Breakfast could be improved. I would reccomend this hotel and would go back should I return to Istanbul

Reviews.Title: “excellent stay in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: 1gertrudebell
Reviews.Content: Very good location to visit the most interesting part old Istanbul. The hotel is nice and very clean. Free WiFi Full breakfast served from 7 am and even earlier if asked. Friendly staff with compliments for Kadir and Emin. Excellent price quality hotel, I can only recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “If that is what they call service, do'nt bother”
Reviews.Author: albatrossCadizSpain
Reviews.Content: after booking this hotel in June and everything confirmed by email including one from the hotel re airport transfers, this booking was cancelled, supposedly because our credit card details were incorrect, as we had already confirmed them ,I just can't see how this was possible, We were touring Turkey for three weeks prior to our stay, and I was unable to access my emails, It was pure chance that the evening before we returned to Istanbul I managed to access my email and found the cancellation, We then spent 2and half hours on the internet trying to find alternative accommodation.This ruined our final night in Cannerkale , I find it reprehensible that the hotels are able to do this We had no trouble with all the other hotels I booked using the same details.

Reviews.Title: “Good choice”
Reviews.Author: dyuSanFrancisco
Reviews.Content: Great location - in a quiet street and close to all attractions. From airport, you can take subway to Zeytinburnu station then take tram to Gulhane station (about 3 minutes walk to the hotel). Room is clean and has excellent ac, the only downside I have is the wifi connection in the room,signal is very week.

Reviews.Title: “A very pleasant stay in this beautiful city”
Reviews.Author: LausanneJen
Reviews.Content: The GÃ¼lhane Park Hotel is a very pleasant hotel and has a great location. There is a nice terrace with a good view on Istanbul where the choice of breakfast is very large and tasty! The Hotel is easy to find and the staff can arrange a transfert for you from the airport. The staff is very helpful and welcoming. From this hotel you can do all your visits by walking around and discover thisbeautiful city! Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “comfortable bueauty”
Reviews.Author: angela2135805
Reviews.Content: the location was beautiful. the hotel was clean and inviting. the staff was warm and professional. the person at the front desk, named sinan was curtiuos and spoke english very well, and was very hospitable. i thoroughly enjoyed my stay, and look forward to returning again!

Reviews.Title: “It would be hard to go past this one.”
Reviews.Author: FrancoiseAustralia
Reviews.Content: We recently spent 8 days in Istanbul and continued staying at this hotel after our tour finished. From the outset we were offered a very generous upgrade and were treated as special guests by the hotel manager, Soner Onal, and his staff. Our room was large, clean and comfortable. No great view but that did not matter. We loved the location away from all the tourists in the Sultanhamet yet within easy walking distance of the Blue Mosque area and the Bosphorus, Golden Horn, bazaars etc. We have no complaints about this hotel and would recommend it as great value for money (after bargaining of course!)

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel with the warmth and hospitality of a bed and breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: magnoliatravels
Reviews.Content: Our family (6 of us travelled together) fell in love with the city of Istanbul! What added to our wonderful introduction to this city was staying at the Gulhane Park Hotel. The staff was warm, helpful, accommodating, and seemed to reach no end with their hospitality. Any time of day or night you were greated as a if you were a long time friend returning home. The breakfast served every morning offered a nice variety of delicious ways to start the day. The rooms were clean and well-tended to. The neighborhood is centrally located, yet tucked enough away that it is quiet and secluded feeling. It's a lovely 15 minute walk to the Blue Mosque, passing Topkapi park, Hagia Sophia, and lots of shops and restaurants along the way. Not knowing we'd love this hotel so much when travel plans were made, we spent the last 2 nights at another "boutique hotel" a couple blocks away. We wanted to run back to Gulhane Park Hotel! The other was nice, but "cookie -cutter" and lacked the charm that Gulhane Park spoiled us with! Despite our no longer staying there, when it was time to go the airport, we asked them about their shuttle service. They offered a shuttle that was half the price of the shuttle offered by the second hotel, without even knowing what the other had quoted us. Fair and friendly til the end! Having stayed there, we feel like we have friends in Istanbul, and we hope to visit them and their beautiful city soon again!

Reviews.Title: “A tremendous value. Beautiful hotel, gracious staff, great location.”
Reviews.Author: Drbitenc
Reviews.Content: My sixteen year old daughter and I were picked up at the Attaturk airport by Mr. Soner ONAL the General Manager of the hotel and his driver. We were treated to kind conversation and a tour of the sites along the way to the Gulhane Park Hotel. It was a warm welcome and appreciated since, while we have traveled throughout Europe this was our first Eastern country and Soner rapidly put us at ease with his gracious hospitality. The location is walking distance to most of old Istanbul with the Topokai palace across the street, the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sofia down the block, the Grand Bazar and Bosphorus port short walks away with many other sites close by. The room was large and comfortable with wonderful views and cost from half to a third of comparable rooms we have stayed in. The breakfast and meals at the hotel are excellent and give a taste of Turkey. We are glad we found the Gulhane Park Hotel for our week in Turkey and will stay there again the next time we get to be in Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value and a Great Room and Kind Staff”
Reviews.Author: travelman06100
Reviews.Content: This is essentially a luxury hotel at a great value price. It is situated in the heart of the Sultanahmet District and all of the top sights of Istanbul are easily accessible from this location. Personnel is extremely kind and helpful. Although the room was really big, they are new and very clean. I recommend gulhanepark hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Stride distance from all the best places”
Reviews.Author: Abdulqadir
Reviews.Content: Last Thursday we came back from Istanbul. We stayed during our trip for twelve days in Gulhane Park Hotel. We enjoyed our stay very much. The hotel is located in the center of all interesting places to visit. The hotel is clean and tidy. The staff are very warm, nice and welcoming for all visitors. Great hospitality and quick service for whatever you ask. I recommend the hotel for every visitor to Turkey. I would like to thank all the workers of the hotel reception, dining room, room services, I would like to thank especially Mr Soner Onal and Mr Irfan Kiper. Our next trip to Istanbul will always be Gulhane Park Hotel. Best wishes, Family Abdulqadir

Reviews.Title: “per”
Reviews.Author: zineb1982
Reviews.Content: It was a great place, great location in the heart of Istanbul. The staff were very helpful. the neighborhood was quiet at night, many restaurants and shops around. the breakfast bar had various choices. the room was clean when I checked in. I absolutely recommend this hotel for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “magical experience”
Reviews.Author: ricardo_costa7
Reviews.Content: i've stayed gulhane park hotel for like a week or so, and i simply loved what i've seen there. great hospitality, helpful staff, very comfortable, wide and fresh rooms, and such a terrace with a great view. i'll immediately reccomend this hotel to my fellows back in barcelona when i get back there. and for the record, the breakfast itself could give enough satisfaction in this hotel. don't miss it.

Reviews.Title: “Middle of the history”
Reviews.Author: hildiri
Reviews.Content: We, me and my wife, were traveling to Istanbul for just out of curiosity. We have been planning to have a trip to Istanbul for a long time. Therefore, we wanted to be near to the place where most of the historical places are. The "Historical Peninsula" is one of the must-see locations in Istanbul. In fact, it is not only "one" location, so we planned to spend couple of days in this area. Gulhane Park Hotel was referred by one of our Turkish friend as a over-moderate, nice, clean boutique hotel near Eminonu. We have also searched our other options by online however I am quite happy that we did not checked in for another hotel. With a reference, we decided to have our 2 night stays there in Gulhane Park Hotel. As I told before, the decision was made because the place of the our hotel is one of its great advantages. I, personally, was aware of the traffic problem of this city and I wanted to be as much as nearer to the must-see places of Istanbul. Moreover, it was considerably positive impression for us once I checked in to the hotel. At the end, the keywords for Gulhane Park Hotel can be ordered like: "cheerful assistance", "high quality service", "cleaner places/rooms", and most important of all, "middle of the history".

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: greatdilemma
Reviews.Content: it was my first time at Gulhane Park Hotel ans that was incredible. I felt like in home.

Reviews.Title: “Ask a question, get a sales pitch”
Reviews.Author: DAT-DFT
Reviews.Content: The Gulhane Park Hotel is an average tourist class hotel and by no means 4 star. For the price we paid (about $120) we got what could be expected, a shower that leaked all over the floor when not in use, a room over the front entrance where we were awakened by delivery trucks each morning at 5:30, etc. However, the thing I found most irritating was that whenever we tried to ask something someone tried to sell us something. For example, we sat down for drinks in their bar and found ourselves getting the hard sell about a Turkish Night dinner they could arrange or another restaurant they could book. This went on for 15-20 minutes before we even got our drinks. The worst, however, was on the last night of our stay when we asked if a cab could be arranged for 6am to take us to the airport on the Asian side. The guy at the front desk insisted that the trip was so long that no cab would take us there and that they would need to arrange an airport shuttle for us. They insisted the trip would take at least 1 hour and 15 minutes and possibly longer, so the over $100 we paid to the guy at the front desk didn't seem outlandish. That is until we arrived at the airport in less than 30 minutes. When we returned we decided to take a cab from the Asian airport to a point in Istanbul much farther than the Gulhane Park Hotel and the fare was only $60. We are still wondering how much of the shuttle fee was simply pocketed by the guy at the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “There must be better service at other hotels...?”
Reviews.Author: gforgrr
Reviews.Content: Similar to others on here - hotel was 'overbooked' when we arrived at 11pm, was reassured vehemently that their 'sister' hotel was only '50m away'. Uh, no, it wasn't. Was basically told our only option was to stay at this other hotel for 2 nights. 'Please understand' - yeah, right. Not really any choice though - we did manage to secure an upgraded room for when we returned to the Gulhane 2 days later. Upgraded room was a suite - was fine - not amazing, not horrible - clean and tidy. Breakfast each day was fine - 6.00TL for fresh orange juice is a ripoff but they do provide Tang (take me back to childhood!) free of charge. Hardly any hot selection but the cold meats and cheese and salads etc are fresh and tasty. So, I had almost forgiven them the 'overbooking' at the start of our trip. UNTIL we checked out and the receptionist asked us to wait so that her colleague 'could check that we hadn't left anything behind' (ie nicked anything from the room) - pretty much the story of the hotel really.

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: traveling_with_D
